name: Matrix Gift
description:
This game is full of Surprizes!

Terrain is random!

Gifts are random!

you never know what to expect!

You need to get as much score as possible. To do this you need to find gifts, however, everytime you collect a gift more drones are going to try to shoot you.

Made by

https://red-core.itch.io

https://itch.io/profile/cloakedfoxgaming
